0: From the drink that is handed to you as you board the jitney to be taken to your room to your butler assisted pool time to the fantastic dining overlooking the bay the service is impeccable
we like the food and the beach
The beach is truly gorgeous with a nice view of St John
A tremendous ocean view oversized balcony great beach pool and outdoor dining options
The Ritz Carlton employees were amazing along with the views of the beach
We actually stayed for a few days at the Mariot Frenchmans Reef first and then moved to the Ritz for the latter part of our trip
Cruz Bay staff had to be the best thing going for the hotel
Beautiful the staff is exceptionally friendly first day at the beach
The property is perfectly situated with its own bay and a view of St John USVI across the way
Snorkeling good for beach snorkeling and water sports are included too
1: Trying to keep it brief and noting upfront that the review is from snobby travelers with high expectations with the Dorado Beach Ritz Carlton Reserve in Puerto Rico setting a baseline
New Years Eve lunch we decided to eat at Coconut Cove again because we wanted the chicken pasta
At the beach you need to reserve a chair early in the morning if you want to sit in the front row
This is definitely not a pure white sand beach Incase that is what you are looking for
To my knowledge there is no arcade or really much else to do besides lounge at the pool beach activities and excursions
The DJ plays the music so loud at the pool overlooking the beach trying to drown out the construction noise so it is disturbing to those trying to relax at the beach
With one pool closed on the hotel side it felt a little crowded at the other pools and the beaches were still being worked on
The downsides are rebuilding of the beach sand has not allowed ecologically for the beach to be what it once was because this will take time

There are nowhere near enough chairs at the pool Each of the 4 days we were there we had to wait for chairs forget about a choice of where to sit and some days we were forced to go to the beach because every single pool chair was taken
